shortDescription: Several vulnerabilities are present in GFI KerioControl due to improper sanitization of the 'dest' GET parameter used to generate a 'Location' HTTP header. The affected endpoints include /nonauth/addCertException.cs, /nonauth/guestConfirm.cs, and /nonauth/expiration.cs. Exploitation could allow for HTTP response splitting and may additionally lead to a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS).
vulnerabilityName: GFI KerioControl HTTP Response Splitting Vulnerablility
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
